version_description:
- optimised for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus native resolution
- optimised for iOS 8 and 64-bit
- fixed severe crash bug on certain iOS 6 devices (customers running iOS 6: please install this update if you are experiencing any issues)

Thank you for using Friend Blender HD! If you enjoy using Friend Blender, please support us by leaving/updating your review on the App Store after each update.

Also check out our other apps:
- Friend Blender VIDEO (new!)
- Mexpose - Double Exposure
- 4 Pics 1 Place - Travel Picture Quiz

Send your comments and suggestions to support@friendblender.de
